text: int n ; int sum ( int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , int i , int j , int b [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ) { int s ; if ( i >= n ) { return 0 ; } if ( b [ i ] [ j ] != 0 ) { return b [ i ] [ j ] ; } int s1 = sum ( a , i + 1 , j , b ) ; int s2 = sum ( a , i + 1 , j + 1 , b ) ; s = max ( s1 , s2 ) + a [ i ] [ j ] ; b [ i ] [ j ] = s ; return s ; } int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , i , j , k , T , b [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; while ( T -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d " , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { b [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } int ans = sum ( a , 0 , 0 , b ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , ans ) ; } return 0 ; }
